testcase.name: Critical Player Experience: Game Playability › players should be able to start the game and see questions
Critical Player Experience: Game Playability › should verify question files are accessible
Critical Player Experience: Game Playability › should verify app loads without JavaScript errors
Classic Mode: Full Game Flow › should play through all questions and restart cleanly
Classic Mode: Quick Start Flow › should complete full classic mode game flow
Classic Mode: Quick Start Flow › should handle rapid question navigation
Classic Mode: Quick Start Flow › should maintain game state during navigation
User Experience: Real Gameplay Test › should allow users to start and play the game successfully
User Experience: Real Gameplay Test › should check if questions are actually loading
